title: TOS CORE for Pathfinder RPG + D&D3.5
description:
TOS CORE
========
Based on Excel 2007+, TOS CORE is a FREE Character Sheet which supports both the Pathfinder Roleplaying game and D&D3.5 (OGL).

FEATURES
========
Some of the main features of TOS CORE are:

* Dynamic Play through the LapTop worksheet
* FULL implementation of the Stacking Rules
* Contains all the content from the PathfinderÃ‚Â® Roleplaying Game Core RulebookÃ¢â€žÂ¢
* Contains all the content from the System Reference Document (D&D3.5), including the Psionic rules and the Epic rules (exception; the Divine rules)
* Integration of the rules so you can focus on playing, and not adding numbers
* Several sections of the Community Forum are available to TOS CORE users


REQUIREMENTS
============
* Microsoft Excel 2007 or more recent version, updated to the latest service pack
* Macros must be activated
* Does NOT work on the Macintosh
* Does NOT work in Excel clones


Enjoy! <a href="
http://TheOnlySheet.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://TheOnlySheet.com</a>
